verses.verse: And thou<WH1121>, son of man<WH120>, prophesy<WH5012> against Gog<WH1463>, and say<WH559>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Behold<WH1463>, I am against thee, O Gog, prince<WH7218> of Rosh<WH7218>, Meshech<WH4902>, and Tubal<WH8422>:

and I will turn thee about<WH7725>, and will lead thee on<WH5927>, and will cause thee to come up from the uttermost parts<WH3411> of the north<WH6828>; and I will bring<WH935> thee upon the mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478>;
and I will smite<WH5221> thy bow<WH7198> out of thy left<WH8040> hand<WH3027>, and will cause thine arrows<WH2671> to fall<WH5307> out of thy right<WH3225> hand<WH3027>.

Thou shalt fall<WH5307> upon the mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478>, thou<WH102>, and all thy hordes, and the peoples<WH5971> that are with thee<WH5414>: I will give thee unto the ravenous<WH5861> birds<WH6833> of every sort<WH3671>, and to the beasts<WH2416> of the field<WH7704> to be devoured<WH402>.
Thou shalt fall<WH5307> upon the open<WH6440> field<WH7704>; for I have spoken<WH1696> it<WH5002>, saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.
And I will send<WH7971> a fire<WH784> on Magog<WH4031>, and on them that dwell<WH3427> securely<WH983> in the isles<WH339>; and they shall know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068>.

And my holy<WH6944> name<WH8034> will I make known<WH3045> in the midst<WH8432> of my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>; neither will I suffer my holy<WH6944> name<WH8034> to be profaned<WH2490> any more<WH1471>: and the nations shall know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068>, the Holy One<WH6918> in Israel<WH3478>.
Behold <WH935>, it cometh, and it shall be done<WH1961>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>; this is the day<WH3117> whereof I have spoken<WH1696>.

And they that dwell<WH3427> in the cities<WH5892> of Israel<WH3478> shall go forth<WH3318>, and shall make<WH1197> fires<WH784> of the weapons<WH5402> and burn<WH5400> them<WH4043>, both the shields and the bucklers<WH6793>, the bows<WH7198> and the arrows<WH2671>, and the handstaves<WH3027>, and the spears<WH7420>, and they shall make<WH1197> fires<WH784> of them seven<WH7651> years<WH8141>;

so that they shall take<WH5375> no wood<WH6086> out of the field<WH7704>, neither cut down<WH2404> any out of the forests<WH3293>; for they shall make<WH1197> fires<WH784> of the weapons<WH5402>; and they shall plunder<WH7997> those that plundered<WH7997> them<WH962>, and rob those that robbed<WH962> them<WH5002>, saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.

And it shall come to pass in that day<WH3117>, that I will give<WH5414> unto Gog<WH1463> a place<WH4725> for burial<WH6913> in Israel<WH3478>, the valley<WH1516> of them that pass through<WH5674> on the east<WH6926> of the sea<WH3220>; and it shall stop<WH2629> them that pass through<WH5674>: and there shall they bury<WH6912> Gog<WH1463> and all his multitude<WH1995>; and they shall call<WH7121> it The valley<WH1516> of Hamon-gog<WH1996>.
And seven<WH7651> months<WH2320> shall the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> be burying<WH6912> them<WH2891>, that they may cleanse the land<WH776>.

Yea <WH5971>, all the people of the land<WH776> shall bury<WH6912> them<WH8034>; and it shall be to them a renown in the day<WH3117> that I shall be glorified<WH3513>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.

And they shall set apart<WH914> men<WH582> of continual employment<WH8548>, that shall pass through<WH5674> the land<WH776>, and<WH5674>, with them that pass through, those that bury<WH6912> them that remain<WH3498> upon the face<WH6440> of the land<WH776>, to cleanse<WH2891> it<WH7097>: after the end of seven<WH7651> months<WH2320> shall they search<WH2713>.

And they that pass through<WH5674> the land<WH776> shall pass through<WH5674>; and when any seeth<WH7200> a man<WH120>'s bone<WH6106>, then shall he set up<WH1129> a sign<WH6725> by<WH681> it<WH6912>, till the buriers have buried<WH6912> it in the valley<WH1516> of Hamon-gog<WH1996>.
And Hamonah<WH1997> shall also be the name<WH8034> of a city<WH5892>. Thus shall they cleanse<WH2891> the land<WH776>.

And thou<WH1121>, son of man<WH120>, thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Speak<WH559> unto the birds<WH6833> of every sort<WH3671>, and to every beast<WH2416> of the field<WH7704>, Assemble<WH6908> yourselves<WH935>, and come; gather<WH622> yourselves on every side<WH5439> to my sacrifice<WH2077> that I do sacrifice<WH2076> for you<WH1419>, even a great sacrifice<WH2077> upon the mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478>, that ye may eat<WH398> flesh<WH1320> and drink<WH8354> blood<WH1818>.

Ye shall eat<WH398> the flesh<WH1320> of the mighty<WH1368>, and drink<WH8354> the blood<WH1818> of the princes<WH5387> of the earth<WH776>, of rams<WH352>, of lambs<WH3733>, and of goats<WH6260>, of bullocks<WH6499>, all of them fatlings<WH4806> of Bashan<WH1316>.
And ye shall eat<WH398> fat<WH2459> till ye be full<WH7654>, and drink<WH8354> blood<WH1818> till ye be drunken<WH7943>, of my sacrifice<WH2077> which I have sacrificed for you<WH2076>.

And ye shall be filled<WH7646> at my table<WH7979> with horses<WH5483> and chariots<WH7393>, with mighty men<WH1368>, and with all men<WH376> of war<WH4421>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.

And I will set<WH5414> my glory<WH3519> among the nations<WH1471>; and all the nations<WH1471> shall see<WH7200> my judgment<WH4941> that I have executed<WH6213>, and my hand<WH3027> that I have laid upon them<WH7760>.
So the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> shall know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068> their God<WH430>, from that day<WH3117> and forward<WH1973>.

And the nations<WH1471> shall know<WH3045> that the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> went into captivity<WH1540> for their iniquity<WH5771>; because they trespassed<WH4603> against me<WH5641>, and I hid my face<WH6440> from them<WH5414>: so I gave them into the hand<WH3027> of their adversaries<WH6862>, and they fell<WH5307> all of them by the sword<WH2719>.
According to their uncleanness<WH2932> and according to their transgressions<WH6588> did<WH6213> I unto them<WH5641>; and I hid my face from them<WH6440>.

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>: Now will I bring back<WH7725> the captivity<WH7622> of Jacob<WH3290>, and have mercy<WH7355> upon the whole house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>; and I will be jealous<WH7065> for my holy<WH6944> name<WH8034>.

And they shall bear<WH5375> their shame<WH3639>, and all their trespasses<WH4604> whereby they have trespassed<WH4603> against me<WH3427>, when they shall dwell securely<WH983> in their land<WH127>, and none shall make them afraid<WH2729>;

when I have brought them back<WH7725> from the peoples<WH5971>, and gathered<WH6908> them out of their enemies<WH341>' lands<WH776>, and am sanctified<WH6942> in them in the sight<WH5869> of many<WH7227> nations<WH1471>.

And they shall know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068> their God<WH430>, in that I caused them to go into captivity<WH1540> among the nations<WH1471>, and have gathered<WH3664> them unto their own land<WH127>; and I will leave none of them any more there<WH3498>;

neither will I hide<WH5641> my face<WH6440> any more from them<WH8210>; for I have poured out my Spirit<WH7307> upon the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.
